item.title: The ☀ Continent Powered by the ☀
item.description:
The ☀ Continent Powered by the ☀

Masar is ushering a new era of smart energy in the Middle East & North Africa. News 8-24/9/2015: Masar participates in leading industry events Global Cleantech Summit and FinSolar in Helsinki. 31/8/2015: Climate-KIC selects Masar as one of its Hessen Accelerator startups of 2015. 28-29/7/2015: Masar delivers remarkable keynote at the inaugural SolarTech conference in Cairo.
